Author: BEDBulimic
Text: If you see rule 1, we can’t suggest exercises for you to burn calories, as that wouldn’t constitute harm reduction, but encourage compensatory behaviours ie. “purging”.  Locking but not deleting, as I think swamphag’s response is important to read.

Author: SwampHag4589
Text: That’s not a binge. That’s reactive hunger. It’s how the body responds to starvation. You shouldn’t be ashamed — your body is trying really hard to keep you alive. You won’t gain from this, I promise.
